decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Reason: In order to comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [insert plan numbers/documents].
Reason: In order to ensure the development is carried out in accordance with the planning permission.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans.
Reason: In order to safeguard the appearance of the area.

Reason : 1 - The proposed alterations to fenestration including replacement of front and rear windows and doors, replacement of roof tiles, erection of front canopy, by reason of size, design, materials and appearance would be intrusive developments, out of scale and character with this semi-detached house and the surrounding area, having an adverse effect on the visual amenities of the locality. Thus, it is contrary to Local Plan policies SC7, CC1 and CC2 of Local Plan, policies of London Plan and the National Planning Policy Framework.

Reason : 2 - The proposal would likely to have a serious and adverse effect on the existing tree at the adjoining property, which in turn would have a detrimental effect on the character and amenity of the locality. As the submission makes no justification or assessment of proposal of impact on the tree, in the absence of Arboricultural Assessment, it would be contrary to Local Plan policies CC1, CC2 and GB7 and the National Planning Policy Framework.
description: Erection of a single storey rear and a first floor side extension, conversion of garage into a habitable room, installation of solar panels on the garage roof, alterations to fenestration including replacement of front and rear windows and doors, installation of roof lights, replacement of roof tiles, Erection of front canopy and boundary treatment.
